alert.note: Alert for Spencer; Warrick (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 12 at 4:31AM EST until January 12 at 5:15AM EST by NWS Paducah
info.description: The National Weather Service in Paducah has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Warrick County in southwestern Indiana... Spencer County in southwestern Indiana... Northwestern Daviess County in northwestern Kentucky... Northeastern Henderson County in northwestern Kentucky... * Until 415 AM CST. * At 331 AM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Stanley, or 12 miles west of Owensboro, moving northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Stanley around 335 AM CST. Owensboro and Eureka around 340 AM CST. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Folsomville, Dale and Santa Claus. This includes the following highways... Interstate 64 in Indiana between Mile Markers 50 and 60. Audubon Parkway between Mile Markers 5 and 22. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
